thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com
thread.title: Mary Anne Walker
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by Mary Anne Walker

author: Mary Anne Walker
title: Mary Anne Walker
text: Actually before I bought several $25.00 coupon deals for your company, I had ordered 4 lobster rolls from Lobstergram.com at a cost of $95.00 (fresh not frozen). They were just as delicious as yours but with FREE SHIPPING. Even if I paid shipping costs, it was still way cheaper. My $25.00 coupons for your lobster rolls merely covered half of the shipping cost and I still was paying more. So I suggest you check out this competition before making those claims.
